There are sentient beings who are possessed by ghosts and spirits, who are cursed by enemies, who suffer from the strange phenomena of evil stars, who are chased by corpses, who suffer from various illnesses such as epilepsy and emaciation, all of which he is able to save and cure.

And they are able to discern the teachings of the world beyond, correctly naming and explaining the meaning, observing the essence and characteristics, and practicing in accordance with them.
